titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for a conditional adjournment of the House from April 9 to April 21, 1987, and a conditional adjournment of the Senate from April 9, 10, or 11 to April 21, 1987.

action.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 4/9/1987--Introduced. Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from April 9 until April 21, 1987, and of the Senate from April 9, 10, or 11 until April 21, 1987.
